div.head: 杖撲傷損
div.div: injury from blows with a cane

bibl.title: Ben cao gang mu dictionary Vol1

entry.def: injury from blows with a cane

sense.def: Pathological Condition of da pu shang sun 打撲傷損 , injury from a blow, with a cane. Ben cao gang mu 本草綱目 Substance Entry san qi 三七：凡杖撲傷損，瘀血淋漓者，隨即嚼爛，罨之即止，青腫者即 消散 , “For all injuries from blows with a cane , with stagnant blood [that has left the vessels] pouring, immediately chew [ san qi ] to a pulp and use this to cover [the afflicted region]. This will end it. In case of greenish-blue swelling, [it is essential to apply] dispersing [medication]”.
